text: aur tumhaare deen kee pairavaree kare usake siva kisee doosare kee baat ka aitabaar na karo (ai rasool) tum kah do ki bas khuda hee kee hidaayat to hidaayat hai (yahoodee baaham ye bhee kahate hain ki) usako bhee na (maanana) ki jaisa (umda deen) tumako diya gaya hai, vaisa kisee aur ko diya jaay ya tumase koee shakhs khuda ke yaho jhagada kare (ai rasool tum unase) kah do ki (ye kya galat khyaal hai) fazal (va karam) khuda ke haath mein hai vah jisako chaahe de aur khuda badee gunjaeesh vaala hai (aur har shai ko)e jaanata hai
